short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks dailymail.co.uk links, because you don't need that rubbish in your life.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sometimes you'll be sent on a collision course with the Daily Mail website, whether you like it or not. This extension helps keep your world a little less hateful, in the face of such horror.
